SELECT c.CT_ID, c.CT_DIV, cp.C_NAME, m.M_NAME, c.CT_MATERIAL_ID, i.I_NAME, c.CT_ITEM_ID, c.CT_AMOUT_MONEY, c.CT_QUANTITY, c.CT_UNIT, to_char(c.CT_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') as CT_DATE, to_char(c.CT_IB_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') as CT_IB_DATE, to_char(c.CT_OB_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') as CT_OB_DATE FROM CONTRACT c, COMPANY cp, ITEM i, MATERIAL m WHERE c.CT_COMPANY_ID = cp.C_ID AND c.CT_ITEM_ID = i.I_ID(+) AND c.CT_MATERIAL_ID = m.M_ID(+)
AND (c.CT_ITEM_ID LIKE '%' || #{find_item} || '%' OR i.I_NAME like '%' || #{find_item} || '%')
AND (c.CT_MATERIAL_ID LIKE '%' || #{find_material} || '%' OR m.M_NAME like '%' || #{find_material} || '%')
AND cp.C_NAME LIKE '%' || #{find_name} || '%'
AND c.CT_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{find_contract_start_date}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE(#{find_contract_end_date}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND c.CT_IB_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{find_ib_start_Date}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE(#{find_ib_end_Date}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND c.CT_OB_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{find_ob_start_Date}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE(#{find_ob_end_Date}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
ORDER BY c.CT_ID
